Wonderful couple

Against those who believe in the rumors between her and Tom Cruise.

Jennifer loves her husband.

Put this thing on your mind!

summary: ϟ loki headcanons ______ - after complaining and complaining, loki persuades tony into adding a library in the compound  - that...
body:
ϟ loki headcanons

______

- after complaining and complaining, loki persuades tony into adding a library in the compound

- that is of course if loki stops acting so stubborn and moves in with the team

- the team tries to warm up to loki only because of thor

- loki wears a suit and tie to every. single. event. 

- “i have to look presentable.” he says.

- he refuses to introduce any color besides green, yellow, or black to his life. 

- “it’s my aesthetic!”

- after being indulged in midgardian culture inspires loki. he even pierced his nose after seeing a barista with a hoop

- loki buys poptarts for thor (but he’ll never admit to it)

- peter and thor are the only people who can get to loki. loki cannot stand how adorable the spiderboy is, and he can’t stand how persistent his brother is

- loki enjoys the snow because it reminds him of asgard

- there are days were the grief of losing his home and mother get too much. he spends the whole day in bed, not even eating

- it’s not any better that thor speaks of ‘the good ole times’ at almost every team dinner

- oh the dinners. and the parties. loki despises the mandatory gatherings, but he does like watching the team get trapped in mindless chatter with civilians

- he only reason loki gets a phone was to send anonymous hate mail to the avengers

- loki is ‘sick’ all of the time, and unfortunately misses some of his brother’s invitations to hang out

- loki loves summer so he can read and lounge by the pool

- tony always yells at loki for lounging by the exercise pool

- “it’s for exericising! not laying around!”

- tony yells at loki a lot for laying in places he’s not supposed to

- loki takes all of the coffee (to clint’s disappointment)

______

title: A Comparison Study
body:
Can we be honest for a minute and discuss how similar these two are?

-Heir to a throne

-Outsiders to their own family

-Being called monsters

-Wanting a place in the world

-Building or improving on their kingdoms

-Having extraordinary powers (which include ice)

-Having a giant creature fight their battles

-Said creature breathes out a substance (Marshmallow is snow and ice. Destroyer incinerates with fire.)

-Both were imprisoned for a short period of time because they acted out.

-Both have been lied to since they were children about what they were. Loki never found out he was a frost giant until he was an adult. While never touched upon in the movie, Elsa’s parents never discussed her abilities in the beginning other than her father stating, “Elsa! This is getting out of hand!” So he was actively discouraging his daughter to use her gifts.

-Oh, and can I add that their dads were just the worst!

-Both characters never really wanted the throne originally.

-They are both about self preservation. Loki puts himself first in survival. Elsa believes isolation will mean her freedom.

-Both of them get make overs as their movies progress (can be left to interpretation).

-Both of them kill their siblings.

-Said siblings come back to life from that death.

-Siblings learn to love each other, accept one another, and reunite.

I think the writers of Frozen just wanted to make a girl version of Thor (especially since Elsa originally was going to be the villain).

Either way, I ship these two.

I’d go on, but it’s almost 2 AM here. I need to sleep. I’ll let you guys add anything. Good night all!

Thank you @yoursaviourhasarrived for letting me/listening to me rant. XD

Thank you @yoursaviourhasarrived for letting me/listening to me rant. XD

body:
Hey!

Can’t get the image out of my mind, someone gets lost in the vents falls out into the middle of a crowded room look around around just as confused as everyone else in the room and say, “I bet you’re wondering why I gathered you here today.”

summary: Forced smile ( Steve Rogers x Reader x Bucky)
title: Forced smile ( Steve Rogers x Reader x Bucky)
body:
This is Itsy Bitsy and I’m not even sure if it also comes in as a drabble. It’s just an idea.
Italics are a person’s thoughts. example; ‘sample.’
(f/n) , (l/n) = Reader’s First Name, Last Name.
(e/c) = eye color
I, of course, own nothing but the story itself. The characters mentioned and used are not property of mine of course.      

     His summer-sky blue eyes noticed the notable change in her (e/c) colored ones. He watched as they melted down and glossed, irises bouncing at the sight before her, completely taken over by a flickering affection now growing inside her heart. Across from her the steel-eyed man was also stuck looking distant, caught in between reality and space as he grasped her hand, barely managing to hold it within his own.

It was a moment that seemed eternal, almost slowed down in a sense,  not just for woman and metal armed man, but also the first avenger.

Right on the side, Steve saw it all and his heart clenched at the idea…
just the mere thought…

‘Had it only been my imagination?’ He thought shakily, feeling his insides twist with unease. It suddenly felt like he was watching a screenplay, being a complete outsider to the interaction just inches away from him, and that was just it…
She was just an arm’s length away, and yet, it felt like there were hundreds of acres put between them.

    Bucky said something, and whatever it was it was enough to make her snort, drawing a chuckle to produce from him. With that little action alone, Steve Rogers knew that he’d lost her.  He never thought that seeing that beautiful smile grow on her face, or that shining twinkle in her eye would cause him pain, but it did.
Forcing a smile, he joined them in their laughter as it was all he could now… simply watch the sidelines.

               She was in love, and not with him, but with his best friend.

blog.description:
ALWAYS BE KINDER THAN NECESSARY

Romanogers, Dramione, Winterwitch, Paneville, NottPott

Marvel, Harry Potter , Star Wars

summary:
Children behave, 
That’s what they say when we’re together..
And watch how you play
They don’t understand and so we’re..
Running...
body:
Children behave,

That’s what they say when we’re together..

And watch how you play

They don’t understand and so we’re..

Running just as fast as we can,

Holding on to one another’s hands..

Trying to get away into the night

And then you put your arms around me..

And we tumble to the ground and then you say

I think we’re alone now,

There doesn’t seem to be anyone around

I think we’re alone now

The beating of our hearts is the only sound..

Avengers Initiative ✍🏾 ☂️

i think were alone now…

summary:
that tv trope where the kid gets an emergency credit card and the parents are like "only use this if you need it"
tony gives one...
body:
that tv trope where the kid gets an emergency credit card and the parents are like “only use this if you need it”

tony gives one to peter incase hes in a sticky situation. three days later may calls tony asking if he gave the money to peter for him to buy three puppies

“it was an emotional emergency and i needed them”
